channel.title: AI Generation with LLM and RAG on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in AI Generation with LLM and RAG on Validated Patterns

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Deploying the demo Following commands will take about 15-20 minutes Validated pattern will be deployed git clone https://github.com/<<your-username>>/rag-llm-gitops.git cd rag-llm-gitops oc login --token=<> --server=<> # login to Openshift cluster podman machine start # Copy values-secret.

item.title: GPU provisioning
item.description: GPU provisioning Use the instructions to add nodes with GPU in OpenShift cluster running in AWS cloud. Nodes with GPU will be tainted to allow only pods that required GPU to be scheduled to these nodes
